title: The White Chapel
description: Scarlett has decided Michael and she cannot work out their differences and leaves him. However, the sordid deal that brought them together is still very much in force. And when Scarlett learns that Michael is much more loyal to her than she initially thought, she is quickly swept back into an earth-shattering affair with him. One which will either leave her in complete ecstasy, or utterly heartbroken.
author: Marilyn Cruise
